video.title: Gmail Keyboard Shortcuts
video.description:
We're busy people who learn to code, then practice by building projects for nonprofits. Learn Full-stack JavaScript, build a portfolio, and get great references with our open source community.

Join our community at http://freecodecamp.com

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/intent/user?screen_name=freecodecamp

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/freecodecamp

Follow Quincy on Quora: http://www.quora.com/Quincy-Larson

topLevelComment.author: Lior Bobrov - הרמוניה בתנועה
topLevelComment.text:
Thanks 4 this... :)
While composing a new message, is there a keyboard shortcut for "add attachments"?

topLevelComment.author: Damian Bast
topLevelComment.text: Hey, have you tried using inbox.google.com instead of the standard gmail interface? Shortcuts work the same but you have a few awesome features like remind/stick etc :) - what do you think?

topLevelComment.author: John Macklis
topLevelComment.text: Very helpful, thank you. I'll add that you can also actuate "Send" with Ctrl-Enter. I use it instead of tabbing, and it's greatly reduced the amount of half-baked emails I send out.
